81102.<center>王家の財宝を荒らす者は 誰だ……。\n我が眠りを妨げる者は 誰だ:
Who is he who would lay waste to the treasures
of the crown who would disturb my slumbers?

81103.<center>また現れたのか……いやしい賊め……。\nこれ以上 王家の財宝を荒:
Here you are again, you vile bandit, to
further ruin the treasures of the royal family
and disturb my slumber.

81104.<center>秘宝の守護者を おそれず\n何度も やってきおって……。\n貴様:
Who are you that you have come so many times
without fear of the guardians of the
treasures?

81105.<center>貴様の勇気に免じ 我が名を教えてやろう……。\n我は この大ピラ:
For your bravery, I will tell you my name for
I am Arach Kamen, the Pharaoh of the Pharaohs
who built the Great Pyramid.

81106.<center>我のなきがらは 神秘のチカラを宿す\n秘宝と共に このピラミッド:
My remains, along with the hidden treasure that holds the power of mystery, were placed in this Pyramid... all to protect the golden
treasure...

81107.<center>予想どおり……我の死後 黄金の秘宝を\n狙う者が あとを絶たなか:
As expected...after my death, there was no end to the number of people who sought the golden treasure... An unpleasant sight calling
themselves treasure seekers.

81108.<center>神聖なる黄金の秘宝が けがされぬよう\n我は この地に眠る死者を:
I have raised the dead from the dead who lie
here to protect our treasure so that the
sacred golden treasure may not be destroyed...

81109.<center>秘宝の守護者の中には かつて\nファラオと呼ばれた 時の王たちも:
Among the guardians of the treasures are the kings of time, once known as the Pharaohs... the golden treasure is the pride of my
family...

81110.<center>なぜだ……。\nなぜ しつように 黄金の秘宝を狙う……？\n何が:
Why do you persistently seek the golden
treasure? What is it that drives you to the
treasure?

81111.<center>幾度となく この地を訪れる 貴様は……\nまさか 伝説の秘宝の探:
You have visited this place many times... are
you Syndra, the legendary seeker of hidden
treasures? Why are you here?

81112.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラ……。\nまさか 死んだはずの貴様と:
Syndra, seeker of legendary treasures I never
thought I'd see you again after you had died.

81113.<center>シンドラ……。思い返せば 貴様と我の勝負は\nいまだ 決していな:
Syndra... as I recall, you and I have never
had a contest before... but perhaps it was
fate that brought us together here...

81114.<center>おかしい……。貴様とは 何度も戦ったが\nなぜ 愛用していた あ:
Strange... I have fought you many times, but why do you not use the Sun God's Scimitar that you used to love so much? Do you underestimate
me? Oh, abominable...

81115.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラの証たる\n太陽神の曲刀を どうあっ:
How dare you not wield the Sun God's Scimitar,
the proof of Syndra, seeker of legendary
treasure... Don't tell me...you're not Syndra?

81116.<center>そうか……。貴様 シンドラではなかったのだな。\nあやつのような:
So... you are not Syndra. I never thought I'd
see a bony treasure seeker like you again.

81117.<center>どうしたことだ……。胸が おどる……。\n貴様の足音が この地に:
What's the matter with you my heart beats faster every time I hear your footsteps approaching this place what have you done to
me? What have you done to me?

81118.<center>きょ……今日は 少し遅かったな……。\nこのアラハ・カーメンを:
You're a little late today to be messing with
this Arach Karmen, but you've got more guts
than Syndra. ...

81119.<center>遅い……！ 遅いぞ 貴様ああぁぁぁ……！\nさては 貴様……我の:
You're late...! You're late, you ah...! So, you're the one who enjoys playing with my heart, I won't let you go, I won't let you
go...!

81120.<center>我は 死にながらにして 生きがいを\n見つけてしまった……。それ:
I have found my purpose in life even in death
and that is to fight you for the Golden
Treasure...

81121.<center>よく来たな 奇跡の探求者よ！\nさあ 今日も 我の血潮をたぎらせ:
Welcome, miracle seeker! Let my blood run hot
today! Go, guardian of treasures!

82738.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82739.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82742.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82743.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82744.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82745.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82746.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82747.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82748.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82749.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82750.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82751.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82752.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82753.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82754.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！:
Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those
who would avenge the crown...!

82755.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！\n王家に仇なす者に 死を与えるのだ！:
Go, guardians of the treasure! Give death to
those who would harm the crown!

82756.<center>死せる者に 生きがいを与えるとは\n貴様は まさに 奇跡の探求者:
To give the dead a reason to live, you are
truly a miracle seeker...

83798.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！\n今日こそ この者に 泣きを見せるのだ:
Go, guardian of treasures! Today is the day
you will make him weep!
